description: An AI-powered personal assistant application that manages emails, calendars, and daily routines while providing motivational support as a virtual life coach, fitness guide, and mental wellness companion. Features voice/speech interaction for hands-free use during morning routines and workouts.
goals: Email management: Read, categorize, and highlight important emails
Calendar management: Track events, set reminders, find actionable items
Life coaching: Provide motivation, psychological support, fitness and diet coaching
Daily routine management: Morning workout motivation, end-of-day journaling
Voice interaction: Hands-free control through headphones
target_users: Busy professionals aged 25-45 who struggle with time management and seek comprehensive productivity and personal growth tools
key_features: AI-driven email categorization and priority highlighting
Smart calendar with actionable item extraction
Fitness and diet tracking with AI coaching
Morning routine management and workout motivation

constraints.technical: Must support voice interaction, integrate with email/calendar APIs
constraints.privacy: Sensitive personal data requires strong encryption and privacy controls
